# anggape/raylib-template

## Requirements

### VSCode Extensions

-   [clangd](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=llvm-vs-code-extensions.vscode-clangd)
-   [Native Debug](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=webfreak.debug)

### Dependencies

-   clangd
-   CMake
-   GDB
-   GCC / Clang
